name: Lovell Minnick Partners
overview: Lovell Minnick Partners is focused on investments in the global financial services sector. Their Funds have a particular interest in areas such as asset management, financial planning, financial product distribution, specialty finance, securities brokerage and investment banking, commercial banking and trust services, and related administration and business services companies and outsource providers in the financial services industry.

milestones.description: Lovell Minnick Announces Acquisition Of First Allied
milestones.source_description: Lovell Minnick Announces Acquisition Of First Allied
